flags.note: In a boat at the end of the canal.
On a high, small wooden plank.
On a high wooden bridge connecting two buildings, stretching over the canal.
In the boat at the very end of the canal.
On top of a small cage/spire, next to a rooftop garden.
On a small, one-story structure with a wooden roof in a small courtyard.
On a wooden balcony up one story, on a building right on the city border wall.
On a tall upright pole, which sits on a 1-story wood deck in between two 2-story buildings.
On one of the several skinny wooden planks over the indoor street (this is inside the long building!).
Ground, in small alley between building and fenced garden.
On the roof of the long building, near the edge, where the long, dome-shaped divider meets the edge.
On a wooden roof connecting the roofs of two buildings.
On a short porch on the side of a building, near ground level.
On the ground, in a small alley.
On the corner of the roof of the building with a large dome, in plain view.
On the roof of the small, triangular building, in plain view.
Down a tiny alley with a bench that is easy to miss, under a wooden roof.
At ground level, right next to a building, to the left of the haystack.
Down a small alley.
On a small wooden overhang on the side of a building, near ground level.
At ground level, near the wall of a building.
On a wooden roof one story up, under a wooden overhang.
At ground level, in a small alley.
At ground level, in a small garden with no entrances; you must jump over a short wall to get into it.
At ground level, in a small alley.
On a wooden overhang on the wall of a building.
In plain view, on a short wall in the middle of a short set of stairs.
In a section of the roof closed off by the long, dome-shaped divider.
At the end of a small alley, at the bottom of a ladder.
On the roof of a building, next to the large dome, in plain view.
On a small, ground level porch.
Ground level, down a small, twisting alley between two buildings.
On a wooden roof one story up, surrounded by 3 two-story buildings.
Ground level, in a small courtyard, under a curved stone roof.
On a wooden overhang.
On the roof, in plain sight, next to one orange safe place.
Ground level, in a small courtyard.
In between a one and two story buildings, in bottom of a ladder.
On the roof, next to some crates, in plain sight.
Ground level, in a small courtyard.
Above the plaza, on a hanging wooden platform.
Ground level, in a short alley, next to a tree.
In a narrow alley, next to/behind a stone wall, depends on which side you approach it.
On a small one story roof, next to a ladder.
On a wooden balcony resembling structure in the side of the large building.
This is inside the large building that has a courtyard inside, in one of the corners of the walkway on ground level.
In between a one and a two story building, at the bottom of a ladder. There is a wooden overhang above it.
In a short alley, next to a tree, a door and a ladder.
On the rooftop, in middle of three domes.
In a closed off area by the large temple at ground level.
On a stone overpass, next to a cage-resembling structure, with ladders on both sides.
Up high on the roof, on a wooden beam.
On a wooden overhang, behind one of the domes of the large building.
On the roof, between a small building and the city wall.
On a rooftop, in plain sight, next to the city wall.
In a narrow alley, next to/behind a stone wall, depends on which side you approach it.
On the roof, in plain sight, next to some crates.
Up high on the roof, on a wooden overhang.
In a small courtyard, behind a ladder, under a wooden overhang. The courtyard also has double wooden doors guarded by two guards.
On the roof, on top of one of those cage-looking structures.
Ground level, on top of some small stairs, in front of a door, next to a fence.
On a rooftop, between some crates and baskets.
On a small rooftop one story high, there is a wooden beam above it.
On the roof, next to some crates.
On a small roof, one story high, next to some barrels and a door.
Ground level, in front of a door, surrounded by fence.
in a small courtyard, behind a ladder, under a wooden overhang.
